data.description:
I'll be making my SF debut at Hotel Utah at 9:00! Even So (https://evenso.bandcamp.com/releases) is opening at 8:00.  The headliner is still TBA. Tickets are available at the link below, or at the door.  

https://www.ticketfly.com/purchase/event/1427946?_ga=1.93792533.926061728.1487084517
data.name: San Francisco Debut At Hotel Utah

data.description: Free show!  It'll be my first in LA, and my last in LA for the foreseeable future: Hope to see you there!
data.name: Los Angeles Debut at Silverlake Lounge

data.description:
Join me for my NYC Debut!  The show is free, and runs during happy hour (four dollar pints, dude). Please invite any friends who might be interested!
Demos and such are available here: www.aaronwaldman.com
data.name: NYC Debut at Pianos

data.description:
Mark Kilianski and Aaron Waldman will be bringing original folk and bluegrass tunes to the Thirsty Pig this Monday night.  There's an extensive beer list, no cover, and no good reason not to come say hi!

http://www.markkilianski.com/
http://www.aaronwaldman.com/
data.name: Mark and Aaron @ the Thirsty Pig

data.description:
Our last night in Vermont!  We're hoping to make some new friends from the Montpelier music scene.  Our tunes are available here: 
chrishellermusic.com
aaronwaldman.com
data.name: Chris Heller and Aaron Waldman @Bagitos
